986500.name: Gratuitous Zombie Cannon
986500.description:
A dual stage survival FPS/Defense/strategy zombie game; a DSSFPSDSZG you could say...¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Stage 1 (Birds-eye-view strategy): Place defense mechanisms such as turrets, mines, etc around you.
Stage 2 (FPS): Shoot incendiary rounds at the zombies from your powerful cannon!

In summary, there are a bunch of zombies and cannons. So, shoot the zombies with the cannons. You could say the gore, the cannons, the zombies, and this entire game are all uncalled for, lacking good reason, and unwarranted i.e. gratuitous.
We agree. That's why we name this game GRATUITOUS ZOMBIE CANNON!!!
986500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
